name: Accruent Holdings
overview:
Accruent leads the industry with a comprehensive suite of enterprise location management solutions that enable organizations to develop and operate their real estate and facilities portfolios as a competitive advantage.

Organizations across diverse industries turn to Accruent to right-size their real estate portfolios, eliminate unnecessary spending, and support compliance and sustainability initiatives. Over 400 customers have chosen to partner with Accruent because of our best-in-class functionality, deep domain knowledge, proven implementation success, and track record of customer commitment.

In 2008, Accruent was positioned by Gartner, Inc. in the Leaders Quadrant in the 2008 “Magic Quadrant for Integrated Workplace Management Systems”. Accruent has been named to the Deloitte & Touche â€œTechnology Fast 50â€ list for seven consecutive years for achieving triple-digit revenue growth, is a two-time winner of the prestigious Site Selection William Dorsey Service Provider Award for superior client service and was named the Software Council of Southern California 2006 Developer of the Year.

Founded in 1995, Accruent is headquartered in Santa Monica, California and has offices in Chicago and Irvine.

funding_rounds.source_description: Accruent lands $32M for real estate management software
